page.title: 14HOBBIES
page.content: Most Edale people have hobbies that they can pursue in the village.Here is a list of some of them. Walking,Riding,Gundogs,Football, Reading,Flower Arranging,Scottish Dancing,Gardening,Rock Climbing,Fell Walking, Needlework, Tennis, Swimming, Cycling, Farming, Poetry, Learning Italian, Darts and Dominoes, Dam Building, Woodwork, Jogging, Acting, Astronomy, Computers, Photography, House Maintenance, Music, Studying Literature, Winemaking, Birdwatching, Dressmaking. {The Village Hall}is used for clubs parties,dances,concerts and voting. The Horticultrial Society uses it in August for the Flower Show.The Parish Council,The Ringing Roger Club,(Sunday School),and Play School meet there.The Primary School uses it for gym.
